page.title: 08THE DAY OF A VILLAGE BOY
page.content: ON MONDAY MY CLOCK WAKES ME UP AT EIGHT O'CLOCK.I GET DRESSED,WASH AND I GO DOWNSTAIRS FOR MY BREAKFAST.THEN I GO BACK UPSTAIRS AND GIVE MY MOUSE BREAKFAST.THEN I GO INTO THE GARDEN AND WAKE MY CHICKS.BY THIS TIME MY CHICKENS ARE AWAKE AND SO I FEED THEM AND GET THE EGGS. THEN I GET MY FOOTBALL KIT AND GO TO SCHOOL. ON ARRIVAL I GO IN AND GET THE KEYS FROM THE HEADMASTER FOR THE STOCK CUPBOARD. IUNLOCK IT AND GET THE COMPUTER.I RETURN HIS KEYS AND GO OUT TO PLAY. THE WHISTLE GOES AT 8:55AM. WE GOT IN AND THE REGISTER IS CALLED THEN WE GO DOWN TO ASSEMBLY AND WE SAY OUR PRAYS. AFTER WE GO BACK UP AND DO OUR DIARY AND MENTAL ARITHMETIC AND BEFORE WE GO OUT TO PLAY FOR 25 MINS.
